text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: All tasks must be completed.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
If one is assigned a task, one must<n>see all associated
processes through<n>to their conclusions.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: That is what "responsibility" entails.

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: AAAAAH!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Was that a scream? I think it came<n>from Ritto Dorm!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
W-wait, don't go, Rice! We should<n>stay inside and notify the
dorm leader<n>in case it's dange—

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Everyone, please stay away!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Gasp! That was Bourbon!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Rice?!

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: Aaah! Aaaagh, aaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: What happened?! You look like<n>you've seen a ghost!

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: E-even worse... A hand... There was a<n>zombified hand!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...I'll warn everyone to avoid the area.<n>I know what caused
this...

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Bourbon! I'm with the prop team,<n>and I was just
wondering if you got<n>the toy zombie hand we asked for<n>
yet.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Ah! I apologize for the wait. The dorm<n>leader and academy
staff approved<n>the proposal, so I'll put in the order<n>for it
now... Hm? Mmm?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
What, so all dis fuss was for a toy?!<n>And fix your phone, for
cryin' out<n>loud!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
A toy, yes. It seems the net order<n>was not sent correctly. I
was in the<n>process of returning the fifty excess<n>"Zippity
Zombie!!" units when their<n>circuitry malfunctioned.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Fifty?! Man, I shoulda known after<n>the fog incident. We've
gotta keep ya<n>away from the tech...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
My current tasklist requires handling<n>electronic devices. I
am unable to<n>"keep away" from them at thi—

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hold up, hold up. Me 'n Creek can<n>handle the runaway
hands, no<n>problem. You hang tight and leave it to<n>us.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: But...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Sigh. Why's she keep acceptin'tasks she can't do on her own? Butanyways, any luck on your end,Creek?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
...Hey, Tamtam? I was just thinking.<n>Wouldn't it have been
better to bring<n>Bourbon with us?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Uh, why? She breaks every electronic<n>doodad she touches.
What's the<n>point, setting her up for failure?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Ya wouldn't make a preschooler tally<n>up the family's
monthly budget, would<n>ya? Just let Bourbon focus on her<n>
strengths.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: (But Bourbon looked so upset...)

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff. Bourbooon! Wesnagged the hands!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I apologize for the trouble. Not only did<n>I fail my task, I made
you complete it<n>for me...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: It's not that big a deal. Just letus know if ya need any more help.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No. I will ensure that a failure like this<n>does not happen
again.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...I am truly sorry for today. I'll be<n>more diligent going
forward.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huh? Hey! Bourbon, wait!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
All we need's a "thanks," not all this<n>mopey "sorry"
business! Aaaaagh!<n>Get back heeeere!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Tamtam...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I get the feeling that Bourbon isn't the<n>only one who needs
some guidance...

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Rice! W-was everything okay? You<n>know, with Bourbon and
the scream<n>we heard...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, um. She... she's probably fine.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ...Probably?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...Sorry. I shouldn't have flown out<n>like that. I didn't mean to
cause a big<n>fuss right before bed.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm really, really sorry. Good night.
Click.
